titleStmt.title: E. S. Dunster to James F. Robinson
CWG12099

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 1st - 20th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Primary Source Documents

body.p:
Surgeon General's Office
Washington City, D. C.
June 6th 1863
Sir:

Official notification has been received at this office of the following vacancy Surgeon 13th Kentucky vice Charles D. Moore dismissed June 1st 1863, It is desirable that if such vacancy still exists it be filled as soon as consistent with the interests of the Service,

Very Respectfully
Your obedt Servt
By order of the Surgeon General
E S Dunster
Asst Surgeon U. S. A.

His Excellency James F. Robinson
Governor of Kentucky
Surgeon Genl announces vacancy to be filled
